verses.verse: In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that the <S%H8661>commander<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> when <S%H5623>Sargon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him and he <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> and <S%H3920>captured<s%> it,

at that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H9198>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> and <S%H6605>loosen<s%> the <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> from your <S%H4975>hips,<s%> and <S%H2502>take<s%> your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> <S%H4480>off<s%> your <S%H7272>feet.<s%>" And he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H9201>"Even<s%> as My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H9198>Isaiah<s%> has <S%H1980>gone<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> as a <S%H226>sign<s%> and <S%H4159>token<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H3568>Cush,<s%>

<S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> will <S%H5090>lead<s%> <S%H5090>away<s%> the <S%H7628>captives<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and the <S%H1546>exiles<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush,<s%> <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H2205>old,<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot<s%> with <S%H8351>buttocks<s%> <S%H2834>uncovered,<s%> to the <S%H6172>shame<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
"Then they shall be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> and <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush<s%> their <S%H4007>hope<s%> and <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> their <S%H8597>boast.<s%>

"So the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2008>this<s%> <S%H339>coastland<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> <S%H3541>such<s%> is our <S%H4007>hope,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> we <S%H5127>fled<s%> for <S%H5833>help<s%> to be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> and we, <S%H349>how<s%> shall we <S%H4422>escape<s%>?'"
